name: Letter
description:
It is midnight on a Friday. You sit alone on the couch in your apartment room, staring aimlessly at the roof. - You reach to the nearest beer bottle, but turning out to be empty. - But you carve for a hit. For that feeling of being in the clouds. - So, you decided to open up that stash of acid you stored in your room. - Pills drops into your hands, the sight alone is enough to make you want to consume them. - "Take me" it says, "We will have a great time" - After all, you want all the pain to go away. - So Sit back and Relax, and be H-A-P-P-Y    Letters is a very short basic platforming game, created for the DATT 4300 game jam.

  The theme for this part of the game jam is Aesthetic The aesthetic we chosen for this game jam project is ACIDGRAFIX (or acid graphics)

Letters is one of the 4 games that we have to make for this game jam 

 

Members: 

Matthew Wang (Programming, Level Designer)

Daniel Rios (Programming, Level Designer)

Joseph Yong (3D Modeller, Graphic Designer) 

Sayid Allie (Shader Artist, Programming, Level Designer) 

Rayjay (Programming, Level Designer)

Credits:

Free Third Person Controller by Invector

Stock Footage by Pexels

10 Skyboxes pack: Day - Night Asset by Wello Soft
